snippet: Vaibhav Suri joins the ranks of teenage grandmasters, not all of whom have lived up to the promise they showed when they were young.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes that 15 year-old Vaibhav Suri has joined the ranks of teenage grandmasters, not all of whom have lived up to the promise they showed when they were young.
lead_paragraph: Vaibhav Suri joins the ranks of teenage grandmasters, not all of whom have lived up to the promise they showed when they were young.

headline.seo: Chess: Vaibhav Suri Is Latest Teenage Grandmaster
headline.main: Early Success Is No Guarantee of a Career Among the Elite
